{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} 

i wish there was a non-frowning clapping sticker, because this deserves a round of applause
this comment gets my {{champion:63}} of approval{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
And you get my {{item:3086}} of approval
and you get my{{item:3109}} of upvotes
Puns are the best. More puns please!
Well, you know {{champion:6}} a {{champion:26}} of them.

that was bad.
But ig it was {{champion:33}} .
(It makes sense OK.)
{{item:3901}} ! who's will sir?!
im {{summoner:3}} ed after making all of these puns
{{champion:64}} ned a horrible sin. for this, he goes to jail
after messing with that witch, i thing i have a {{champion:4}}
all of you {{champion:22}} holes need to stop
These puns make my eye {{champion:29}}
i ate a child on accident because i thought it was a cookie{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

My only critique for the Rakan and Xayah cosplay would be that Rakan's hair was way too poofy, I'd imagine Rakan's would be much more slick. I loved everything else though, and I love how you guys showcase art from people who aren't the best artists but give it their all and show their devotion to the game :'^)
have to agree about the hairstyle bro

Logged in just to upvote
{{champion:412}}
What about 'All-Chat' ?
All chat the show ended back in December. We pulled this segment back out of the show to make it its own thing again!
Why retire /ALL Chat??? That show was great!
There were a bunch of reasons we ended /ALL Chat, but the primary was that we didn't want to be stuck to a "show" format, and the team could go off and work on ALL Chat-like things but not as a show.
I support this I loved getting on for the day and seeing a new "/All Chat" I don't mind this...but I miss the Old Crew
Honestly I thought it was really cringy.
Could you put the videos online somewhere else please? One of my anti-tracking add-ons is blocking the video from loading and I would prefer not to disable it.
tfw your soul crumbles as you have to wear a banana suit as part of your career.
I honestly loved it. I wore it the entire day, and it was the best. I didn't have to, I chose to.  :D

> [{quoted}](name=Riot swimbananas,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=K37unstz,comment-id=00120000,timestamp=2017-06-11T01:27:11.965+0000)
>
> I honestly loved it. I wore it the entire day, and it was the best. I didn't have to, I chose to.  :D

Unbridled optimism has no place in LoL. How dare you.
I need that {{champion:103}} skin

Rito please make it a thing! Heartseeker {{champion:103}}  i would totally buy it in a _heart_ beat.  It's as essential to my life as  {{item:3165}} is to {{champion:103}}.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
I would never get into cosplay, but I really enjoy seeing other people do it.  Nicely done, y'all!
bring back nikasaur!!!﻿
Ah.. Summoner Showcase. Memories of Nikasaur. The good ol' Season 2 days
Am I the only one who liked All-Chat more
What if there was a heartseeker jinx skin? Her ult could explode into a giant HEART{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I....I Like the way you think.
Nikasaur should be brought to co-host, or featured. Along those lines

Hey Rising Darkness, 

As I'm sure you know, Nika left Riot back when the old show ended, and she isn't doing league content anymore. She has chosen to work on her own things, so if you like her work, make sure to support her on her social media channels!

THIS is the new 'host'?
Sorry, but I preferred /ALL Chat

The show format was a hell of a lot better than this. 
What ya got now...it's like a cosplay commercials, I don't mind a good costume but somehow it feels like that's all you got for content.  Besides the other creations like trinkets and crafts. (maybe give us stories on how/why characters have their specific weaponry, like Poppy's hammer as example)

Hey Grandfather, 

Thanks for the feedback! This show doesn't aim to do all the segments of /AllChat or cover all the things that show did. This is just the section/segment of the show that was always called "Summoner Showcase." I'm sure you know that Summoner Showcase use to be its own show before /AllChat and this is just returning to that format.  I hope that helps clear up some stuff about what this show is and isn't.
Personally, I think leonchiro's and littlegem4's Xayah and Rakan cosplay should've been featured. Theirs is on point!

Riot already did a special video just for them. It's on Riot's YouTube channel I believe. It's amazing. Riot took them out to some of the mountains in Ireland. If you need/want the link I can post it.
You should submit them to the Facebook page! That way we can see them!
They gotta make an illaoi skin already, something like instead of tentacles she hits you with trees
#NotMyHost. BRING BACK NIKA!!!!!!!
{{champion:67}} Y can't it have a vayne cosplay:(
{{champion:16}} I see Soraka and I hit that like button lol :D I like this type of approach on videos put out there friendly vibe and straight to the point.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
{{champion:103}} +{{item:3681}} = Heartseeker{{champion:103}}
Bye Felicia
I would like to take this time to pay Silent Tribute to Nikasaur.  She will always be with us.
I just see "Summoner Showcase" and i thought in Nikasaur...{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
